page.title: 02Health care in Fremington
page.content: The most common illness with children is ear aches and sore throats.The most common adult illness is indigestion. Among old people it is bad chests and arthritis.If children catch measels and have spots,they have been infectious for some time and are sent back to school. The medical center is privately owned by Mr and Mrs Lathem who are doctors. It is a good centre for a village and about the right size.They employ the people they want.They have a computer to hold the names of all the patients. There are four husband and wife teams of doctors around our area.The people with more serious illnesses go to Barnstaple.If they can't be treated in Barnstaple they may be sent to Exeter, Bristol or even to other countries for treatment.
